title: Major countries in lithium mine production 2014 to 2019
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Production in metric tons on the Y-axis for 8 different Countrys for 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Australia had the maximum Production in metric tons among all 4 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Production in metric tons was observed in Country Namibia for 2014.
There is a gap of 58500.0 between the highest and lowest Production in metric tons found for 2018 in Country Australia and Brazil.
Averaging all 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019, the Country Australia is the maximum Production in metric tons and Namibia is the minimum Production in metric tons.

For Country Australia, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons 58800.0 among the 4 groups and in Namibia, 2014 had the lowest Production in metric tons 0.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Production in metric tons on the Y-axis for 8 different Countrys for 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Country Australia had the maximum Production in metric tons among all 4 groups, and it was for 2018. The minimum Production in metric tons was observed in Country Namibia for 2014.
There is a gap of 58500.0 between the highest and lowest Production in metric tons found for 2018 in Country Australia and Brazil.
Averaging all 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019, the Country Australia is the maximum Production in metric tons and Namibia is the minimum Production in metric tons.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Production in metric tons on the Y-axis for 8 different Countrys for 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 4 groups, 2018 had the highest Production in metric tons for Country Australia and 2014 had the lowest Production in metric tons for Country Namibia.
For Country Australia, 2018 had the maximum Production in metric tons and it saw the lowest in Country Brazil out of all 8 Countrys.
The maximum Production in metric tons for 2018 that was found in Country Australia was 196.0 times larger than the minimum Production in metric tons observed in Country Brazil.
Out of all 4 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Production in metric tons was found in case of 2018.
2018 had the maximum Production in metric tons out of all 4 groups in Country Australia followed by 2018 in Australia, and the minimum Production in metric tons is found for 2014 in Namibia.
On average, the Country Australia had the highest Production in metric tons for all 4 groups 2014, 2016, 2018, and 2019. Whereas Namibia had the lowest average Production in metric tons.
